Binary: libadios-dev, libadios-openmpi-dev, libadios-mpich-dev, libadios-examples, libadios-bin, python-adios, python3-adios
Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 10), mpi-default-dev, libnetcdf-dev, libnetcdf-mpi-dev (>= 4.6.1-3), gfortran, dh-fortran-mod, libmxml-dev, libopenmpi-dev, openmpi-bin, libmpich-dev, mpich, liblz4-dev, libblosc-dev, pkg-config, cmake, libbz2-dev, zlib1g-dev, libibverbs-dev [!hurd-i386 !kfreebsd-i386 !kfreebsd-amd64], python-dev, python-numpy, python-mpi4py, cython, dh-python, python3-all-dev, python3-numpy, python3-mpi4py, cython3, libglib2.0-dev, libhdf5-dev, libhdf5-mpich-dev, libhdf5-openmpi-dev, libaec-dev
Package-List: libadios-bin deb science optional arch=any libadios-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libadios-examples deb science optional arch=all libadios-mpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libadios-openmpi-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 python-adios deb python optional arch=any python3-adios deb python optional arch=any
